show_image.title: show_image
show_image.tooltip: Takes an input tensor in CHW layout and display it as an image
show_image.externalImports: from matplotlib import pyplot as plt
show_image.sourceCode:
fix, axs = plt.subplots(ncols=len({{{outputs.1}}}), squeeze=False, figsize={{{outputs.4}}})
for i, img in enumerate({{{outputs.1}}}):
	img = T.ToPILImage()(img.to('cpu'))
	axs[0, i].imshow(np.asarray(img), {{{outputs.3}}})
	axs[0, i].axis('off')
	if {{{outputs.2}}} and {{{outputs.2}}}[i]:
		axs[0, i].set_title({{{outputs.2}}}[i])
	axs[0, i].set(xticklabels=[], yticklabels=[], xticks=[], yticks=[])
